title: What are some 19th century novelist? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are indeed many 19th century novelists one could mention… Here are a few: Jane Austen, Charles Dickens, William Makepeace Thackeray, George Sand, Gustave Flaubert, Henry James, Thomas Hardy, The Brontë sisters (Charlotte, Emily and Anne), George Eliot, Harriet Martineau, Emilie Flygare-Carlén, Fredrika Bremer, Oscar Wilde, Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Kate Chopin, Mary Shelley, Leo Tolstoy, Émile Zola… I think this will do, for now… But if you want me to mention more 19th century novelists, I will. Just ask me.
